channel.title: The Best Distro
channel.description:
When you clicked the link you probably thought that I was gonna tell you which linux distro is the best.... Well:
[size=10pt]There is no best linux distro...[/size]
All linux distros are different. There is no 'best one'. If you go to distrowatch.com you will be able to see that the most used distro is Ubuntu. I personally think that Ubuntu is the best, but that is just my opinion.
If you want to see which linux distro is best for you than just go to distrowatch.com and see websites of the first 10 ranking distros. Thats probably your best bet.... Other people on the forums dont know what kind of things you need, they dont know what hardware you have, and they dont know your level of computer knowledge. So you're gonna be the best person to choose a linux distro for yourself...
Thats it...

item.title: The Best Distro
item.dc:creator: @15edwards 15edwards
item.description:
@15edwards wrote:

sayban or pc linux when it comes out

Read full topic

item.title: The Best Distro
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Actually, I’d say all linux distros are more or less the same. They all have the same fundamental flaws it seems and pretty much the same strengths. They can all be coerced into acting like each other. To be honest, it really dosen’t matter which one you use.

Read full topic

item.title: The Best Distro

ubuntu isnt good, it just has a ton of fanboys
[/quote]
Ubuntu > PcLinuxOS[/quote]
Agreed. PCLOS runs fast and all, but it’s a POS.
